body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to the relationship between members of a group of people or a family:
examples: She was accused of being relationally aggressive at school and was required to attend counselling sessions.
Relationally, animals do not relate to other animals in the same way that humans relate to other humans.

body_content.explanation: in a way that forms or describes a connection between things:
examples: Your data can be organized either hierarchically or relationally.
A failure to organize experience linguistically and relationally can cause problems.
